multiagent

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiagent.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the world as a grid of Cells and stores the agents Locations.
    Version:
    1.1, 1.0 - May 22, 2013
    Author:
    Albani Dario, Federico Patota, Gabriele Buondonno

      • setUpForCoverage

        public void setUpForCoverage()
        Create a task for each cell and assign the task to it. Sets all the tasks in the world as to visit.

      • setUpForWeed

        public void setUpForWeed()
        Create a task for each cell that present weeds and assign the task to it. Sets all the task in the world as to spray

        Adds weeds in Cells.
        Parameters:

      • addAgents

        public void addAgents(java.util.List<Agent> agentList)
        Clears current agents and adds the positions of the given ones to its own list.
        Parameters:
        agentList - the list of the agents, ordered for id from 1 to agentList.size().

      • executeAction

        public Task executeAction(int agId,
                          Task agTask,
                          Action act)
        Given an action, the agent is moved based on it. The agent internal state must be changed accordingly.

        When calling this method, the world is notified the fact that the agent has a task associated to the task;

      • executeActionMoveToLocation

        private Task executeActionMoveToLocation(int agId,
                                         Task agTask)
        moves the agent a to Cell c associated with the task. Once c is reached the agent automatically update cell information: the task assigned to the cell is done and cells variables are updated. In general this one is the last action that an agent has to execute in each cycle, given a task (either a cell to visit or a cell to treat) this action moves the agent into position and acts as if the agent accomplished the task. i.e. reaching the cell is enough
        Parameters:
        agId - the id of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        agTask - the task of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        Returns:
        the current task associated with the current cell

      • executeActionPublishNextTask

        private Task executeActionPublishNextTask(int agId,
                                          Task agTask)
        returns the task associated to the new position to spray or to visit (according to the exercise you choose). Compute next Task. The next Task is the next cell that has not been treated or visited in the grid and that can be seen as the task (i.e. where the agent has to spray). Cells that are already sprayed are skipped. If a next cell is found the world is updated with the new agent position. If there is no next cell null is returned.
        Parameters:
        agId - the id of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        agTask - the task of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        Returns:
        the task

      • executeActionCheck

        private Task executeActionCheck(int agId,
                                Task agTask)
        Perfom the check operation over the current cell associated to the task in input. i.e. the robot scans the cell and mark it as visited, the task is marked as done
        Parameters:
        agId - the id of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        agTask - the task of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        Returns:
        the task

      • executeActionSpray

        private Task executeActionSpray(int agId,
                                Task agTask)
        Perfom the spray operation over the current cell associated to the task in input. i.e. the robot spray the herbicidal on the cell and mark it as sprayed, the task is marked as done. If the cell was not visited it becomes visited.
        Parameters:
        agId - the id of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        agTask - the task of the agent requesting to apply the action.
        Returns:
        the task

      • getNumAgents

        public int getNumAgents()
        Returns the number of agents in the world.
        Returns:
        the number of agents in the world.

                    int col)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(Cell cell)
        Returns the occurrence of the Cell in the world according to the coordinates of the latter
        Parameters:
        cell - to be compared
        Returns:
        the World occurrence of the Cell with given coordinates.

        public Cell getAgentPosition(int id)
        Returns an Agent position.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAgents

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAgents(Cell cell)
        Returns all the agents in the given Location.
        Parameters:
        cell - the Location to check.
        Returns:
        list of all the id's of the agents in Location loc.

      • getAgents

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAgents(int row,
                                                   int col)
        Returns all the agents in the Location with given coordinates.
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the Location to check.
        col - the column of the Location to check.
        Returns:
        list of all the id's of the agents in Location (row,col).

      • setAgentPosition

        public void setAgentPosition(int id,
                             Cell c)
        Sets an Agent position.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the agent.
        c - the Cell corresponding to the new Agent position in the world.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(int row,
                       int col)
        Returns true if the given location falls within the grid.
        Parameters:
        row - and col represent the location to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given location falls within the grid.

      • getUncompletedTask

        public java.util.LinkedList<Task> getUncompletedTask()
        Scan the world to find all the uncompleted task. (e.g. non visited cells, untreated cells)
        Returns:
        all the tasks not accomplished in the current execution

      • DPOPexecute

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.LinkedList<Task>> DPOPexecute()
        Method used to execute the DPOP procedure to solve the current problem. You have to fill it with your logic. You can use the given package multiagent.dpop, where you can find some basic implementations of the structure that you need to manage the problem. On the other hand, you can decide to implement your own solution.
        Returns:
        agent2tasks, a structure that map an agent to the task/s
